explanation: [0-0] A man in a yellow T-shirt and beige shorts is standing on a concrete ground, with a little girl in a floral dress holding him tightly. There are many green plants behind the man.

[0-9] Then the man makes fists with both hands, raises his right foot, and the little girl holds him tightly. Then the man twists his wrist with an exaggerated expression, as if imitating the action of riding a motorcycle. Then the scene switches to the interior, where a black and white cat is standing on the floor, also imitating the action of riding a motorcycle. Then the scene cuts back to the man and the girl, the man puts away his hands, leans back, then opens his eyes wide and opens his mouth, expressing shock. The picture switches to the interior again, the black and white cat continues to imitate the action of riding a motorcycle, and waves its arms. Finally, the picture cuts back to the man and the girl, the man is smiling at this time, looks very happy, continues to imitate riding a motorcycle, the girl still holds him tightly.
